description:
Perfect Location
What dreams are made of! The ideal location awaits. Create the perfect home, with excellent access to the Cowes/Silverleaves beach and Cowes golf club. Walk to all Cowes has to offer,. This block is a the perfect blank canvas with ample room for boat or caravan storage.

PRIME LOCATION, WALK TO THE BEACH OR TOWN
This well-built brick town house is located only a short stroll to Cowes beaches and shops. From this location you have a short walk to all Cowes has to offer such as restaurants, cafes, supermarkets and the spectacular north facing beach.
With three bedrooms and two bathrooms there is room for the whole family. The master bedroom is located on the ground floor with a walk-in robe and ensuite.
A spacious kitchen with separate dining, downstairs powder room and separate large living room with high set ceilings.
Upstairs includes the second living room and two more well sized bedrooms all with BIR's. The design of the home offers a central bathroom upstairs with a semi en-suite to one of the bedrooms.
At the rear of the home you have a beautiful north facing courtyard - ideal entertaining your guests. A remote controlled double garage is with direct access to the rear courtyard.
This property is set up to be the ideal holiday home or permanent residence, inspect today to discover what more this property has to offer.

WATER VIEWS - BRAND NEW TOWNHOUSE - UNDER CONSTRUCTION
Spectacular water views...once completed you can enjoy a brand new townhouse with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a child and pet friendly courtyard.
Constructed by one of the area's best known and well respected builder Glen Churchill, this is the perfect investment! We have on offer a 2 storey brand new townhouse with a private rear courtyard, a big patio with large double sliding doors. Open plan living, large hostess kitchen with stone benches. A huge master bedroom with a generous ensuite including a walk in shower. A further 2 bedrooms downstairs and second bathroom with internal access to the remote control garage.
Beach access is just a very short stroll – Approx. 200 meters

RURAL VIEWS RED ROCKS AREA
In a word WOW.
This is an extremely rare opportunity to purchase a fully renovated brick home with rural views and spectacular sunsets, overlooking native trees and horse paddocks, with farm views and the shimmer of water views in the distance. Enjoy the benefits of this incredible lifestyle property without all the hard work of owning small acres.
A blend of formal and informal living zones, splashed with sunshine and warmth, this home is designed for living & entertaining!
When you enter your new home you are greeted with an impressive entrance that leads you to the 1st of 3 living zones, the formal lounge is light and airy with an open feeling looking out to the 1st private undercover deck, a great place to enjoy a family BBQ. The large picture windows take full advantage of the spectacular views – with views in every direction and full northerly aspect.
The fully renovated kitchen is central to your new home with loads of storage. A huge dining/living area leads you to the 3rd living area, overlooking the rural/nature area with views to the farm to the south and water shimmer to the north.
The master bedroom offers a full ensuite and walk in robe, the middle bedroom offers a built in robe and the 3rd large bedroom offers sweeping rural views.
This is a child and pet friendly property with fully landscaped gardens, and extra room for parking cars, a boat or caravan.
If you have been looking for that very special property with a rural aspect and that country feeling, yet just a short stroll to the beach, put this on your list of homes to inspect. Everything is done just move in and enjoy…

Surpassing all expectations!
Situated at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac is this stunning modern single level rendered family home in the popular Shearwater Estate, offering you the the perfect way to enjoy the Island lifestyle, be it for permanent or holiday living.
Comprising spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining zone, second living area that could be utilised as a theatre room or fourth bedroom, three robed bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master is complete with generous his and her walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity and shower.
The well-appointed kitchen offers stone bench tops, Stainless Steel dishwasher, 900mm gas cooktop and electric oven, huge pantry, self closing drawers and glass splash backs.
With a host of additional features including lovely tiled floors, with carpet to the bedrooms, three split system heating and cooling units, combustion heating, high ceilings throughout, giving you a feeling of space, an abundance of storage, and a huge double garage.
Flowing off the main living space is an expansive undercover entertainment deck with café blinds, ceiling fans, services for outdoor kitchen, making it ideal for year round entertainment.
If you are a golf enthusiast, you can drive your cart to the course, or take a leisurely stroll to the picturesque Silverleaves beach.
All set within a 788 sqm approx. fully fenced allotment with lovely established surrounds including a veggie garden and mulched kids play area at the rear, with park/playground nearby. This is a truly wonderful home and inspection is sure to impress.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

QUALITY HOME WITH EXTRAS
Located a short walk to the famous Red Rocks north facing Bay Beach, this near new holiday house has all the bells and whistles one requires in a comfortable home away from home, or a permanent dwelling.
Consisting of 4 spacious bedrooms/2 bathrooms (ensuite to master) 2 living rooms (either side of the central kitchen), beautiful polished floor boards, ducted heating/cooling, timber venetians, full block curtains and quality fittings enhance the superior feeling of this home.
An easterly covered deck the length of the house used as an extension to the kitchen, including an outdoor pizza oven, is a perfect entertainers delight. A vegie garden to the rear of the property with fruit trees is a bonus.
A double lock up garage with a single roll a door to the driveway/garden in the back yard makes room for extra storage on this (approx) 627m2 block of fully fenced land.
Call Jenni Kent for private inspection: 0428566643

ORIGINAL BEACH HOME!
Located on the well sought after Red Rocks beach side of Cowes, this is the first time this property has ever been offered!
With Tassie Oak floors through out and a generous 603m2 approx. block, there is plenty of room to grow.
Inside the property there are three generous sized bedrooms, kitchen dining area and a living with Coonara wood fire.
The kitchen features plenty of cupboard/bench space, 900 cooktop and oven, with a full walk in pantry.
There is a double lock up garage at the rear of the property and a carport at the front.
Whether you are looking for that perfect weekender getaway, or a permanent home – this truly is a great opportunity to enter into the Phillip Island property market!

LAZE AWAY BY THE POOL
maintenance property, look no Located within walking distance to Cowes Shopping area makes this central property ideal.
Set behind a secure gated complex this low maintenance property has all the creature comforts that one could want. Spend the day lazing by the pool or enjoy the undercover BBQ area. Comprising 3 bedrooms, ensuite to Master & WIR , 2 separate living areas gives everyone their own piece of space. Other features include gas log fire, reverse cycle heating and cooling, 9ft ceilings, alfresco area complete with cafe blinds, stone benches to the kitchen, double garage with internal access. If you're after a low further as this one ticks all the boxes.

A Neat & Modern Package!
Located in the Shoalhaven Estate, is this near new, modern, single level hardiplank home. Spacious in it's design, the residence comprises of a well appointed living, kitchen and dining area, three robed bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master is complete with walk in robe and ensuite. There is also a rear deck that flows off the main living space.
Complimented by plantation shutters, double glazed windows, stainless steel cooking appliances, split system heating and cooling, carpet and vinyl plank flooring throughout, with scope to do you own landscaping, garage ect.
All of this is set within a 549 sqm approx. allotment and is within a short stroll to the north facing Cowes beach and a few minutes drive to Cowes Town Centre.
This is an opportunity not to be missed!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

SPECTACULAR FOUR BEDROOM HOME
As you approach this home you pass through the formal porch that is decorated with climbing Jasmine welcoming you in. On the ground floor you find the second living area a great place for the kids to play.
Opening onto the large undercover deck overlooking the Bespoke rear gardens. The owners have designed this space as a functional entertainment area with the custom-made Pizza Oven and fire pit.
In addition, downstairs you will find 3 Spacious bedrooms all with BIR a full family bathroom and rear Laundry.
Upstairs you will find the main living space with open plan kitchen, living and dining complete with Stainless steel appliances all opening onto the covered deck alfresco built to take in the northern aspect and view of the shearwater lake.
This home was built by one of Phillip island leading builders with beautiful hardwood flooring throughout the home.
Situated in the exclusive Shearwater Estate of Phillip Island with the Silverleaves Beach and Cowes Golf Course just across the lake you can enjoy all that Phillip Island has on offer.
Call today to arrange your private inspection or find out about our next open's 5952 2633

BEAUTIFUL, MODERN, SPACIOUS
Located in the beautiful Seagrove estate in central Cowes is this perfect island home.
Featuring four large bedrooms, all with built in robes, the master with a huge ensuite. The open plan kitchen/dining area is perfect for family gatherings and an entertainers delight.
Large central island bench with Caesar stone bench tops throughout and top of the line stainless steel appliances.
There is timber flooring throughout the living areas of the home and carpet to all bedrooms.
Three living zones, with the potential for the establishment of a media room.
The open plan living flows out onto the alfresco dining area with a large outdoor kitchen and a spa bath in the decking.
This property also features a large double garage with push through capability, gas fire place, split system heating and cooling and beautifully landscaped gardens.
There is also ducted gas heating throughout, ducted vacuuming system, a security camera system and ceiling fans.
This property presents a fantastic opportunity to secure yourself a wonderful home in central Cowes.
Inspections are sure to impress.

FABULOUS INVESTMENT
Located close to the heart of town, across the road from the RSL, is this two bedroom/one bathroom brick home with large open plan kitchen/dining and separate laundry located on a 585m2 block of land.
A single car garage to the rear of the fully fenced back yard adds to the appeal of the property.
Renovation would expand its horizons.

QUIET COURT LOCATION IN CENTRAL COWES
Located in a quiet court, this family home is perfectly situated only a few blocks from the foreshore beach and central Cowes.
Bursting with original character and features, this single level home features 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom with shower and bath, separate toilet, private lounge room, large laundry area and spacious dining and kitchen zone which opens onto a lovely rear yard.
The property is a 640m2 (approx.) allotment and features a single car garage and a separate entrance with a carport for secure boat or caravan storage. The large rear yard is fully fenced and offers an established vegetable garden and plenty of lawn area for summer enjoyment.
Spend sunny days walking to the beach or to cafes and restaurants from this fantastic central location. With its lovely presentation, this property is ready for you to walk in and enjoy. Arrange your inspection today.

FORESHORE AT A MAGNIFICENT PRICE!
You wouldn't believe that you could buy something on the foreshore in Cowes with great views at under $250K! Well here it is! This excellent unit has fantastic bay views and fronts onto the Cowes beach area. The unit comes fully furnished and is ideal for couples looking for the perfect getaway. It is low maintenance and comes fully furnished and is ready to move and just enjoy. You won't need a car, listen to the waves lapping on the beach, walk to the restaurant, stroll to the shops or sit on the beach. Like to fish, the jetty is only a few metres away. The unit even has a spa Think this is romantic? Yes it is.

PRICE REDUCTION!!! Contemporary Townhouse - Central Cowes location!
Looking for a fantastic central location, close to everything that Cowes has to offer - then look no further.
This modern contemporary townhouse offers security, location and low maintenance surrounds - and would make the ideal holiday getaway or a fantastic addition to your investment portfolio.
Downstairs offers an open plan living, kitchen, dining area - complemented by polished floorboards, and neutral tones. The kitchen features stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and canopy rangehood, and a glass splashback. A great deck/entertaining area is conveniently located off the kitchen, with a lovely treed canopy - to provide shade and privacy. Also on this level is a separate laundry, powder room and double garage.
On the upper level you will find 3 bright bedroooms (2 with built in robes), and a spacious family bathroom with spa bath, floor to ceiling tiles and twin vanities. A private balcony to the front of the home also offers the perfect space to enjoy a morning coffee.
Other features include:- split system heating and cooling, timber staircase with glass balustrade, and plantation shutters.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

STUNNING VIEWS AND POSITION! LOVE THE LIFESTYLE!
Appreciate the lifestyle this gorgeous resort style apartment has to offer!
On the third level and situated on the foreshore of Cowes in the popular Waves Resort, the views from the balcony and open plan living area are stunning.
The apartment offers
* Stylish and spacious open plan living with split system air conditioning.
* Well appointed quality kitchenette with stove top and plenty of storage.
* Appealing, good size open living/bedroom opening to balcony.
* Separate dining area
* 2 single beds in dining area.
* Luxurious bathroom with full spa.
* A Private balcony for outdoor living with fabulous views.
* Facilities include shared bbq area and laundry.
* Car park space
* Sale includes all furniture and appliances.
Cafes, beaches and great shopping all on your doorstep, love the lifestyle!

PRIZED POSITION, PICTURE PERFECT!
This immaculate home is situated on a 624sm (approx) allotment in the prime location of Central Cowes, an easy walk to Cowes Primary school, medical centres, restaurants and the beach!
Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms, one bathroom and separate laundry, a lovely open plan living, kitchen and dining area featuring high ceilings and exposed beams.
Additional features include a double carport, ample parking out the front and lovely outdoor deck and established garden, this house is the perfect opportunity for investment, holiday home or also has dual use for commercial purposes.
Currently operating as a successful holiday rental and ticks all the boxes to move in right away!
Don’t wait, book an inspection today.

NEW CONTEMPORARY HOME OPPOSITE THE PARK
Selling now in a prime location opposite the park in Shearwater Estate that offers sporting facilities and amenities great for the whole family.
Located close only a short drive to local shops, Cafes, Schools and much more Cowes has to offer
Built by one of our local award winning volume builders this home offers 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a second large living room great for entertaining guests or Media room to watch the footy.
The spacious open plan kitchen living & dining, with walk in pantry opens up to a large covered alfresco area.
Open up the double sliding doors and utilise this space to create another room of the home perfect for BBQ area and relaxing with family and friends.
Designed specifically for this allotment by the owner and full of inclusions this home ticks all the boxes. Walking in you will can see that detail has been on the mind from engineered timber floorboards running the full length of the home, blending the warm soft colour tones with the modern contemporary kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops.
Call today to find out what more this home has to offer and come along to our open or book your private inspection. Phone 5952 2633.

Stunning and Spacious living in Shearwater.
Spacious and perfect for entertaining, this home is situated on a large block in the Shearwater Estate in Cowes. A contemporary home built by a private builder with features such as timber floors and stylish roman blinds and north facing living rooms make this a perfect home or holiday oasis.
Enter the inviting entry hall with master bedroom suite to the left, which features a fitted walk in robe and en suite featuring a large shower and double vanity basins. The hall opens to the carpeted formal living area with north facing windows to the garden. A large study with double wardrobe is to the left of the living room. The family entertaining area features a huge dining area and informal living room opening to an alfresco area and north facing deck. An entertainer's kitchen features stainless steel appliances including a 90 cm oven and 5 burner gas cook top, pantry and ample storage and preparation areas. Two bedrooms and bathroom are located in a separate wing and each feature a three door wardrobe and are large enough to fit a king size bed comfortably. The large laundry room opens to a paved drying area. Zoned ducted heating and cooling keep you cozy and cool all year.
A double garage and side entrance with plenty of space for a caravan and boat and garden outlooks from all rooms are special features of this fabulous home.
Getaway Phillip Island are thrilled to present this beautiful home.

The Perfect Family Coastal Escape!
Positioned in an idyllic location only a short stroll to the gorgeous north facing Red Rocks bay beach this large double storey brick veneer family home offers excellent potential for a spectacular renovation!
The spacious home abounds with character and charm, boasting three good size bedrooms, two bathrooms, including family bathroom with bath and separate shower, huge laundry and a spacious living area on both levels. The upstairs balcony has a beautiful treed outlook ideal for sitting back and relaxing whilst taking in the peaceful vista.
Additional features include: open fireplace, combustion heater, electric wall heater, electric cooktop and oven, dishwasher and ample storage, including under stair storage
A huge garage with a single roller door opening and separate carport along with ample room for car, boat or caravan accommodation and plenty of room for children or pets to roam completes the package.
Well configured for large family getaways or permanent living, set on a private 603sqm approx. fully fenced treed allotment this property will not last long!
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

DRESSED TO IMPRESS!
This modernised and refurbished home is in an excellent location only a short walk to beach and Central Cowes.
Comprising 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a central living zone that leads to the outdoor decking.
The kitchen presents stainless steel appliances an electric oven, gas cook top and plenty of cupboard and bench space.
Other features include carpet to the bedrooms and floor boards throughout, 2 split systems and a double carport.
Contact us today for more information.
